name: cldr-data-downloader
description: Download tool for Unicode CLDR JSON data

scripts.bump: npm run bump:prod && npm run bump:dev
scripts.bump:dev: npm install --legacy-peer-deps $(cat package.json | jq -r '(.devDependencies | keys) - (.skipBump | keys) | .[]' | awk '{print $1 "@latest"}')
scripts.bump:prod: npm install --legacy-peer-deps --save-exact $(cat package.json | jq -r '(.dependencies | keys) - (.skipBump | keys) | .[]' | awk '{print $1 "@latest"}')
